synonyms: śrī-mūrti-lakṣaṇa—characteristics of the Deity; āra—and; śālagrāma-lakṣaṇa—characteristics of the śālagrāma-śilā; kṛṣṇa-kṣetra-yātrā—visiting places like Vṛndāvana, Dvārakā and Mathurā; kṛṣṇa-mūrti-daraśana—visiting the Deity in the temple.
translation: "The characteristics of the Deities should be discussed as well as the characteristics of the śālagrāma-śilā. One should also discuss visiting the Deities in the temple and touring holy places like Vṛndāvana, Mathurā and Dvārakā.
